title: help for this font
content:
Hi, can you please tell me which font is the text "Agence Régionale de Santé Pays de la Loire" on the jpg i sent you?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823043401im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fontars_3562.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [fontars.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823043401/http:/typophile.com/files/fontars.jpg) | 93.1 KB |
author: marco66

comments.content:
[News Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823043401/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/news-gothic) Condensed.  
Vector logo can be found [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823043401/http:/www.ars.paysdelaloire.sante.fr/fileadmin/PAYS-LOIRE/F_concertation_regionale/prs/prs-mars-2012/pdf/PRS-PRESENTATION_GENERALE-version-light.pdf).
It looks a lot like Trade Gothic Condensed no. 18 with a slight stroke around it?
